title: 2022 Free Agency Frenzy
description:
Brian Windhorst is joined by ESPN's Tim MacMahon and Tim Bontemps to react to a wild day in NBA free agency led by Kevin Durant requesting trade from the Brooklyn Nets. The guys talk possible destinations for what could be an unprecedented haul before diving into what this means for Kyrie, how much better the Hawks got, if a rebuild is upon us in Utah and more!

itunes:author: ESPN, NBA, Brian Windhorst
itunes:subtitle: Hoop Collective: Kevin Durant Wants Out Of Brooklyn, What This Means For The League
